name: Hell Color
description:
-Introduction-

- You die and fall to color hell. Using your brain to complete the Lucifer game to regain your life.

- Good luck ~! 

-Tutorials-

- Very easy to play : just swipe to move .

- Move follow color in hell board sign.

- Your destination is jump into portal and get out of hell.

-Devices-

- Support all Android devices

-Credits-

-  2D Artist / UI : VA

- 3D Model / Code / Audio : HaDo
